analysis.description:

	External calls:
	- tokenAmount = pricingStrategy.calculatePrice(weiAmount,weiRaised,tokensSold) (/unique_chucks/31/0x2ee3a8e1ed7082a19737f9bf8fa0e6e3da7e85a3.sol#299-300)
	State variables written after the call(s):
	- tokensSold (/unique_chucks/31/0x2ee3a8e1ed7082a19737f9bf8fa0e6e3da7e85a3.sol#316-317)
	- weiRaised (/unique_chucks/31/0x2ee3a8e1ed7082a19737f9bf8fa0e6e3da7e85a3.sol#314-316)

Reentrancy in Crowdsale.invest (/unique_chucks/31/0x2ee3a8e1ed7082a19737f9bf8fa0e6e3da7e85a3.sol#291-332):
	External calls:
	- tokenAmount = pricingStrategy.calculatePrice(weiAmount,weiRaised,tokensSold) (/unique_chucks/31/0x2ee3a8e1ed7082a19737f9bf8fa0e6e3da7e85a3.sol#299-300)

Crowdsale.getState (/unique_chucks/31/0x2ee3a8e1ed7082a19737f9bf8fa0e6e3da7e85a3.sol#399-422) uses timestamp for comparisons
	Dangerous comparisons:
	- block.timestamp <= endsAt && ! isCrowdsaleFull() (/unique_chucks/31/0x2ee3a8e1ed7082a19737f9bf8fa0e6e3da7e85a3.sol#408-422)
	- block.timestamp < startsAt (/unique_chucks/31/0x2ee3a8e1ed7082a19737f9bf8fa0e6e3da7e85a3.sol#407-422)

ERC20.totalSupply should be constant (/unique_chucks/31/0x2ee3a8e1ed7082a19737f9bf8fa0e6e3da7e85a3.sol#6-7)
PresaleFundCollector.MAX_INVESTORS should be constant (/unique_chucks/31/0x2ee3a8e1ed7082a19737f9bf8fa0e6e3da7e85a3.sol#479-481)
